Instruction: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Cut in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the milk just until moistened.

Knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth, for about a minute. Divide the dough into 2 equal parts. Form each half into a 3/4-inch thick round shape, then cut each round into 4 pieces. Place the pieces on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until the biscuits are golden brown, about 15 minutes.
